Replaces Basic Attack with [Cleaving Strike]. Deals [Damage Rate: 160%] Physical Damage to enemies in a frontal cone

[Basic Attack]:Deals [Damage Rate: 130%] Physical Damage to enemy target. Can cast [Cyclone Slash] every 5s. Deals [Damage Rate: 240%] Physical Damage to nearby enemies and reduces the healing they receive by 15% for 4s.

Swings a giant axe to perform Rock Smash, dealing Damage Rate: 150%] Physical Damage and 1.2s Stunning enemies before the caster. Stones deal [Damage Rate: 50%] Physical Damage to those hit and [Damage Rate: 150%] Physical Damage on landing, also inflicting 30% Slow for 4s.

Charges forward to deal [Damage Rate: 30%] Physical Damage to up to 5 enemies hit, continuously knocking them back. The final impact deals [Damage Rate: 160%] Physical Damage to enemies in range. Fury
Swings an axehook forward to pull up to 5 enemies to the caster, also deals [Damage Rate: 200%] Physical Damage and inflicts 50% Slow for 4s.
Removes control effects and increases Attack Speed by 40%, damage by 15%, and Movement Speed by 30% for 8s.

Deals [Damage Rate: 50%] Physical Damage to all nearby players ([Damage Rate: 75%] Physical Damage to mobs) every 0.5s for 5s. Can move freely while channeling. Cannot be interrupted but cannot cancel skill. Upon stopping the whirlwind, deals [Damage Rate: 200%] Physical Damage to nearby enemies. The damage of the final slash increases based on hits while spinning, up to [Damage Rate: 400%] Physical Damage.

against marked targets restore 6% of missing HP, deal +5% extra damage, while also granting +10% Attack Speed and +8% Movement Speed for 4s. Stacks up to 3 times. Consumes Bloodthirst Mark when triggered.

Throws two axes forward, each dealing [Damage Rate: 120%] Physical Damage to enemies hit. The axes return automatically, dealing [Damage Rate: 120%] Physical Damage to enemies hit. The first enemy hit by each returning axe restores [Healing Rate: 120%] HP Preview mode only allows viewing skill details

Deals [Damage Rate: 300%] Physical Damage to nearby enemies and applies [Grievous Wounds]. Increases to [Damage Rate: 450%] against targets below 40% HP Hold to charge up, gaining interrupt immunity and +80% Damage Resistance. After 1.5s charge, Skill Damage +150%. [Grievous Wounds]: Reduces healing by 40% for 4s.

Leap to the target location, dealing [Damage Rate: 300%] Physical Damage to nearby enemies. Gains [Basic Attack True Damage] and +30% Attack Speed for 6s. Duration extends by 2s for each player (0.6s for each mob) hit, up to an extra 6s. [Basic Attack True Damage]: Basic Attacks deal [Damage Rate: 50%] additional True Damage.

Throws a massive axe in the target direction, dealing [Damage Rate: 90%] Physical Damage and knocking back enemies hit along its path. Reduces Damage dealt by 15% and grants Immunity to Spinning Blade knockback for 4s. The axe returns but does not knock back enemies.

Launches a spinning bladewheel toward the target that cuts enemies along the path, dealing [Damage Rate: 150%] Physical Damage, and the destination. Spins for 5s, Slowing enemies by 30% and dealing [Damage Rate: 75%] Physical Damage every 0.5s while also inflicting [Grievous Wounds]. Each hit increases the wheel's damage by 10% up to 50%. The wheel returns to the caster afterward. [Grievous Wounds]: Reduces healing by 40% for 4s.

Spin toward the target location, reducing the Damage Resistance of enemies hit by 15% for 4s. Each hit deals [Damage Rate: 60%] Physical Damage. The final hit deals [Damage Rate: 220%] Physical Damage and knocks enemies up for 1.5s. Creates dual spinning axes that last 6s and deal [Damage Rate: 50%] Physical Damage every 0.5s.

sword.description: [Basic Attack]:Deals [Damage Rate: 130%] Physical Damage to enemy target. Can cast [Sword Slash] every 6s. Charges toward an enemy target to deal [Damage Rate: 180%] Physical Damage and inflict 40% Slow for 2s.

[Basic Attack]:Deals [Damage Rate: 130%] Physical Damage to enemy target. Can cast [Sword Cleave] every 5. Deals [Damage Rate: 220%] Physical Damage to surrounding enemies. Grants [Target-based Max HP 4%] Shield for each enemy hit, lasting 4s. Stacks up to 5 times.

[Basic Attack]:Deals [Damage Rate: 130%] Physical Damage to enemy target. Can cast [Sword Energy] every 6s. Unleashes sword energy forward, dealing [Damage Rate: 140%] Physical Damage to enemies hit. Increases Movement Speed by 25% for 2s if at least 1 enemy is hit.

Performs 4 forward slashes, each dealing [Damage Rate: 60%] Physical Damage to players ([Damage Rate: 90%] Physical Damage to mobs). The final hit unleashes sword energy forward, dealing [Damage Rate: 150%] Physical Damage to all enemies hit.

Leaps to the target location, dealing [Damage Rate: 200%] Physical Damage and inflicting 50% Slow for 3s to nearby enemies upon landing. Gains [Target-based Max HP 20%] Shield for 4s when hitting at least 1 enemy

Hold to charge with control immunity and gain +20% Damage Resistance. While charging: Deals [Damage Rate: 150%] Physical Damage and Stuns enemies for 0.5s. After charging for 1.5s, deals [Damage Rate: 200%] Physical Damage, Stuns fpr 1.5s and creates a ground wave that deals [Damage Rate: 150%] Physical Damage and inflicts 40% Slow for 4s.

Begins Blocking for 3s. While Blocking, reduces Movement Speed but gains control immunity and +70% Damage Resistance. Afterward, deals [Damage Rate: 320%] Physical Damage to nearby enemies and reduces their Armor by 20% for 4s. Block can be canceled early

Immediately removes all control effects, gains 1 stack of [Sword Momentum], increases Damage Resistance by 25%, and the Attack Speed of the next 3 Basic Attacks by 80% for 8s. Can be used while skills are disabled.

Spins toward the target location, dealing [Damage Rate: 75%] Physical Damage to all players ([Damage Rate: 150%] Physical Damage to mobs) hit. At 3+ Sword Momentum stacks, creates a tornado on arrival, dealing [Damage Rate: 50%] Physical Damage every 1s for 5s.

X Aura and Blade Passive [Momentum]: Gains 1 stack of [Momentum] every second while in combat and 2 stacks when dealing damage with Basic Attacks, 4 stacks on Critical Hit, 1 stack when taking Basic Attack Damage, and 2 stacks when taking Skill Damage. At 10 [Momentum] stacks, increases Sword Momentum by 1 level. Momentum lasts 20s. [Sword Momentum]: Each level grants +3% Damage, +4% Attack Speed, and +4% Damage Resistance. Lasts 10s. Grants up to 6 stacks, decaying over time.

Briefly charges up and then rushes at the target enemy, inflicting [Heal Block] for 3s and dealing Physical Damage based on [Sword Momentum] stacks. [Sword Momentum] stacks: 0 | 1 | 2 | 3-6 Physical Damage: [Damage Rate: 210%] | [Damage Rate: 240%] | [Damage Rate: 270%] | [Damage Rate: 300%] At 3+ stacks, creates an explosion dealing [Damage Rate: 150%] Physical Damage and Stunning for 1s. [Heal Block]: Cannot receive healing.

Unleashes a powerful sword energy toward the target direction, dealing [Damage Rate: 300%] Magic Damage to enemies hit. Additional effects based on [Sword Momentum] stacks: 1 stack: 30% Slow for 2s. 2 stacks: 30% Slow for 2s and Silence for 1s. 3-6 stacks: 30% Slow for 4s and Silence for 2s. At 3+ stacks, unleashes 2 extra Sword Energy. Additional Sword Energy deals 30% reduced damage.

Knocks enemies back 8m and deals [Damage Rate: 450%] Physical Damage. Reduces Damage dealt based on [Sword Momentum] stacks for 4s. Sword Momentum] Stacks: 0 | 1 | 2 | 3-6 Reduction to damage dealt: 20% | 26% | 32% | 38% At 3+ stacks, Knockback increased to 12m and Stuns for 1.5s on collision.

Gains immunity to Forced Movement (Pull, Knockback). Attack range and Max HP increase based on [Sword Momentum] stacks for 10s (Cannot be dispelled) Can use [Titan's Stride] to deal [Damage Rate: 150%] Physical Damage and Knockup enemies for 0.5s. [Sword Momentum] Stacks: 0 | 1 | 2 | 3-6 Basic Attack range: 1.5 | 2 | 2.5 | 3 Max HP: 30% |45% | 60% | 75% At 3+ stacks, creates a titan aura that Slows enemies by 30% and reduces Attack Speed by 30%.

Dashes forward, dealing [Damage Rate: 300%] Physical Damage to all enemies hit. Reduces Damage Resistance based on [Sword Momentum] stacks for 6s. [Sword Momentum] stacks: 0 | 1 | 2 | 3-6 Damage Resistance reduction: 15% | 24% | 32% | 40% At 3+ stacks, Pulls enemies to the center on arrival and slashes multiple times over 1.8s, dealing [Damage Rate: 40%] Physical Damage every 0.3s.

Leaps to the target location, creating countless blades. Physical Damage scales with [Sword Momentum] stacks. [Sword Momentum] Stacks: 0 | 1 | 2 | 3-6 Physical Damage: [Damage Rate: 280%] | [Damage Rate: 320%] | [Damage Rate: 360%] | [Damage Rate: 400%] At 3+ stacks, creates two sets of blades forming outward, each dealing [Damage Rate: 200%] Physical Damage and inflicting 1s Knockup.

Basic Attack]:Deals [Damage Rate: 120%] Physical Damage to enemy target. Can cast [Crushing Smash] every 6s. Charges toward target, dealing [Damage Rate: 160%] Physical Damage to enemies in range and inflicting Slow 35% for 3s

Applies [Vengeful Thunder] to the caster or an allied target [Vengeful Thunder]: Increases Damage Resistance by 25% for 8s. When taking damage or dealing Basic Attack Damage, calls down lightning at the target location, dealing [Damage Rate: 51%] Physical Damage. (Cooldown: 0.8s)

Leaps to the target location, dealing [Damage Rate: 250%] Physical Damage to all players ([Damage Rate: 375%] Physical Damage to mobs) in range. Grants [Target-based Max HP 6%] Shield for each enemy hit, lasting 6s. Stacks up to 5 times.

Fires two heavy rounds that create a gravity vortex where they meet. Enemies in the vortex are Slowed by 25% Deals [Damage Rate: 300%] Magic Damage to enemies in the vortex after 1.5s, pulling them to the center and Stunning for 1s

Gains 1 charge every 15s, up to 2 charges

Throws a powerful grenade at the target location, dealing [Damage Rate: 180%] Physical Damage and knocking enemies back 6m from the center. Reduces Attack Speed by 30% and Movement Speed by 40% for 4s. If within blast radius, the user is pushed back 6m

Consumes 2 bullets to fire two shotgun blasts forward, dealing [Damage Rate: 110%] Physical Damage to players ([Damage Rate: 220%] Physical Damage to mobs) in range Gains 1 charge every 12s, up to 3 charges
Gun holds up to 6 bullets. While not using skills: If at 0 bullets, reload instantly. Otherwise, reload 4s after skill use. Each bullet increases reload time by 0.5s. Cannot interrupt reload

Lock onto an enemy and channel for 3s. Consume 1 bullet every 0.5 while firing. Each bullet deals [Damage Rate: 120%] Physical Damage and reduces Armor by 10% for 4s, stacking up to 3 times. Basic attack critical hits can cause the damage to crit. Ends when out of bullets. Skill 28 24s 0.83s 22 m

Uses 3 bullets to fire 2 Toxic Shroud grenades at the target location. Upon landing, creates 2 Toxic Mist fields, lasting 4s. Each field deals [Damage Rate: 40%] Magic Damage every second to enemies in range and reduces Healing Received by 25% for 6s. Gains 1 charge every 12 seconds, up to 3 charges

Consumes 1 bullet to fire a sniper round in the target direction. The first enemy hit takes [Damage Rate: 100%] Physical Damage. The skill can be charged. After charging for 3s, the sniper round penetrates enemies along its path, dealing Damage Rate: 130%] Physical Damage. Damage increases by 5% per enemy hit, up to 50%. Damage is boosted by Basic Attack Damage and can crit based on Basic Attack Crit Rate, dealing 150% Critical Damage on a crit. Bullet range increases with charge time. Gains 1 charge every 12s, up to 6 charges.

Enter Deadshot mode. Cannot Move but can be canceled at any time Basic Attack replacement: Use 1 Bullet, shooting towards the target direction. The Bullet deals [Damage Rate: 150%] Physical Damage to enemy targets along its path. Damage increases by 6% for each enemy hit, up to a maximum of 60%. Critical Hits deal 150% Critical Damage.

Activates Photon Activation for 20s. Immune to Slow and Immobilize. Gains +20% Movement Speed for 1s. -[Photon Camouflage] -- Removes all control effects. Gain Stealth and +30% Movement Speed for 2s. Can be used while skills are disabled

220%] Physical Damage and applying 2 stacks of [Bleed].

Gains 1 charge every 20s, up to 2 charges

Dashes toward the target direction, leaving a dagger
behind. Upon arrival, deals [Damage Rate: 180%] Physical
Damage and drains 20 MP from nearby enemies, inflicting
2 stacks of Bleed. Can be recast within 5s to return to the
dagger's location, dealing [Damage Rate: 180%] Physical
Damage and draining 20 MP from nearby enemies,
inflicting 2 stacks of [Bleed].

Inflicts the enemy with a Soul Snare, dealing [Damage
Rate: 150%] Physical Damage and linking with the target,
silencing both parties for 5s. During this period, the caster
gains [Soul Snare]. The link breaks if distance exceeds
12m.

[Soul Snare]
Critical Rate: +30%
Damage Resistance: +50%
Attack Speed: +30%
Cannot use skills

Thrusts in the target's direction, dealing [Damage Rate:
140%] Physical Damage and inflicting 2 stacks of [Bleed].
Skill's second stage can be cast within 5s: Dash toward
target direction, dealing [Damage Rate: 225%] Physical
Damage and inflicting 2 stacks of [Bleed] to all enemies
hit. Deals [Damage Rate: 450%] Physical Damage against
enemies with less than 40% HP.

Deals [Damage Rate: 200%] Physical Damage + True
Damage equal to 10% of the target's Max HP to nearby
enemies, while also inflicting 2 stacks of [Bleed].
If this skill triggers Hemorrhage, recovers 10% of Max HP
and gains 40%+ Movement Speed for 3s.

Leaps to the target location, dealing [Damage Rate: 360%]
Physical Damage to nearby enemies upon landing,
inflicting 3 stacks of [Bleed] and [Heal Block] for 4s.
Affected enemies cannot be affected by [Heal Block]
again for 12s.
If this skill triggers Hemorrhage, cooldown is set to 12s.
[Heal Block]: Cannot receive healing.

Dashes forward, dealing [Damage Rate: 150%] Physical
Damage to all enemies hit, inflicting 2 stacks of [Bleed],
and reducing Damage Resistance by 20% for 4s.
Skill's second stage can be cast within 5s:
Deals [Damage Rate: 300%] Physical Damage to enemies
in a frontal cone, inflicts 3 stacks of [Bleed] while also
leaping backward

nature.description:
[Basic Attack]:Deals [Damage Rate: 80%] Magic Damage.

Throws an [Evil Seed] after 5 Basic Attacks.
Throws an Evil Seed at the target location, creating a
thorn zone that lasts 5s. The zone deals [Damage Rate:
40%] Magic Damage every second to up to 5 enemies and
reduces their Movement Speed by 25%.

Basic Attacks become [Soothing Mist].
Releases Soothing Mist in the target direction, dealing
[Damage Rate: 70%] Magic Damage to enemies hit, while
applying 1 stack of [Recovery] to allies.
[Recovery]: Restores HP every second for 12s, stacking up
to 3 times.
HP recovery at 1 | 2 | 3 stacks:
[Healing Rate: 10%] | [Healing Rate: 15%] | [Healing Rate:
20%]

Basic Attacks become [Healing Seed].
Throws a healing seed at the target location that blooms,
healing nearby allies for [Healing Rate: 55%] HP and
applying 1 stack of [Recovery]
[Recovery]: Restores HP every second for 12s, stacking up
to 3 times.
HP recovery at 1 | 2 | 3 stacks:
[Healing Rate: 10%] | [Healing Rate: 15%] | [Healing Rate:
20%]

After a brief delay, creates an entangling zone lasting 4s.
Deals [Damage Rate: 90%] Magic Damage every second
and immobilizes enemies that enter for 1.5s.

Creates an energizing aura around the caster, lasting 5s.
Restores [Healing Rate: 25%] HP and 12 MP every second
to up to 10 nearby allies.

Applies Vitality Seeds to up to 5 nearby allies, healing for
[Healing Rate: 80%] HP and applying 1 stack of
[Recovery].
Vitality Seeds increase Movement Speed by 30% and
Attack Speed by 25% for 6s.
[Recovery]: Restores HP every second for 12s, stacking up
to 3 times
HP recovery at 1 | 2 | 3 stacks:
[Healing Rate: 10%] | [Healing Rate: 15%] | [Healing Rate: 20%]

Cleanses all Hard Control (Stun, Fear, Freeze, Knockup,
Petrify, Sleep), Silence, and 2 DoT effects on the caster
and up to 20 nearby allies. Also heals for [Healing Rate:
60%] HP, applies 1 stack of [Recovery], and prevents the
next 3 Hard Control or Silence effects. The effect lasts 4s.
Can be used while skills are disabled.
[Recovery]: Restores HP every second for 12s, stacking up
to 3 times.
HP recovery at 1 | 2 | 3 stacks
[Healing Rate: 10%] | [Healing Rate: 15%] | [Healing Rate: 20%]

Releases restorative energy at the target location, healing
allies. Healing amount increases based on target's
[Recovery] stacks.
[Recovery] stacks: 0|1 |2|3
Recovers HP: [Healing Rate: 75%] | [Healing Rate: 95%] |
[Healing Rate: 115%] | [Healing Rate: 135%]

Gains 1 stack of Natural Armor every 5s, stacking up to 4
times. Each stack increases Damage Resistance by 8%. 1
stack is lost for each instance of damage taken.

Creates 3 explosions in the target area. Each explosion
deals [Damage Rate: 100%] Magic Damage to players
([Damage Rate: 200%] Magic Damage to mobs). The
caster is healed for [Healing Rate: 60%] HP if at least one
enemy is hit.

Grants Thorn Barrier to up to 5 nearby allies.
Thorn Barrier increases Damage Resistance by 20% and
Attack Speed by 25% for 6s.
When taking direct damage, recovers [Healing Rate: 55%]
HP up to 6 times; also Slows the attacker by 25% for 3s.

Creates a Rain of Serenity at the target location for 10s.
Allies in the rain gain 25% Damage Resistance and
recover [Healing Rate: 25%] HP every second.

Creates a Healing Bloom aura. Allies within gain 15%
increased healing. Consumes 3 MP every second to
restore [Healing Rate: 20%] HP to nearby allies

Launches Root Worms in the target direction. Upon
hitting an enemy target, it will bounce to other enemy
targets within 7 meters up to 9 times. Each target can be
hit a maximum of 3 times.
Each hit deals [Damage Rate: 120%] Magic Damage
Stuns the target for 1s, and reduces damage dealt by 20% for 9s.

Heals all allies hit for [Healing Rate: 100%], cleansing all
control effects and 5 DoT stacks. Also grants immunity to
DoTs and increases healing received by 35% for 6s.

Plants a Divine Rootfall that lasts 20s. After 1s, the tree
matures and restores [Healing Rate: 20%] HP every
second to nearby allies. When enemies cast skills in
range, it shoots sleep seeds that deal [Damage Rate:
200%] Magic Damage and inflict Sleep for 2.5s.
The tree is destroyed after taking 10 Basic Attack hits

fire.description:
Deals [Damage Rate: 90%] Magic Damage and applies 1
stack of [Burn].

Replaces Basic Attack with [Scorching Shard].
After 0.5s cast, fires 3 scorching shards in the target
direction, dealing [Damage Rate: 120%] Magic Damage to
enemies hit and inflicting 1 stack of [Burn]. When multiple
shards hit the same target, additional shards deal 25%
less damage to the original damage.

Replaces Basic Attack with [Wildfire Shard].
After 2s cast, fires a wildfire shard at the target location
that bounces forward twice. Explodes on contact with
enemies, dealing [Damage Rate: 100%] Magic Damage
and inflicting 1 stack of [Burn] to enemies in range

Continuously channels flames in target direction for 3s,
dealing [Damage Rate: 50%] Magic Damage and inflicting
Burn] to all enemies in range every 0.5s.
Can rotate but cannot move while channeling

Damage dealt inflicts [Burn], dealing [Damage Rate: 25%]
Magic Damage every second for 8s, stacking up to 6 times
(stacks do not boost damage).
When [Burn] reaches max stacks, deals [Damage Rate:
80%] Magic Damage to up to 5 enemies near the carrier
and removes all [Burn] stacks.

Channels for 0.5s and then launches a molten orb in
target direction that sticks to the first enemy hit, lasting
5s and dealing [Damage Rate: 90%] Magic Damage to
enemies within 5m every 2s while inflicting 1 stack of
[Burn].

Jumps in target direction, dealing [Damage Rate: 200%]
Magic Damage and inflicting 2 stacks of [Burn] to nearby
enemies upon takeoff.

Sprays oil lasting 8s in front, inflicting [Oil Coating] to
enemies who enter.
[Oil Coating]: Reduces Movement Speed by 50% for 4s.
When affected by [Burn], [Oil Coating] is replaced with
[Volatile Burn] and cannot be inflicted again for 6s.
[Volatile Burn]: Causes Fear and deals [Damage Rate:
56%] Magic Damage every 0.5s for 1.5s.

Activates Overdrive Mode, increasing Casting Speed by
60%, Attack Speed by 40%, and Magic Damage by 20%.
Consumes 5 MP every second.
Use skill again to deactivate Overdrive. Automatically
deactivates when MP is insufficient

After 1s cast, launches scorching flames at the target
location to create Hellfire.
Hellfire lasts 6s, dealing [Damage Rate: 70%] Magic
Damage to all players ([Damage Rate: 140%] Magic
Damage to mobs) within and inflicting 1 stack of [Burn]
every 1s

Fires a Molten Blast in target direction that explodes on
impact, dealing [Damage Rate: 150%] Magic Damage to
enemies in range and inflicting 1 stack of [Burn].
Can be charged. At 3s charge time, the Molten Blast can
penetrate enemies along its path, dealing [Damage Rate:
50%] Magic Damage and exploding at the end point to
deal [Damage Rate: 250%] Magic Damage, inflicting 2
stacks of [Burn], and applying Knockback to enemies
within the explosion range by 3m.
Gains 1 charge every 18s, up to 2 charges.

After a 1s cast, launches three scorching surges at the
target location. After 1s, the flames erupt, each dealing
Damage Rate: 240%] Magic Damage and inflicting 1
stack of [Burn] and Knockup for 1s to enemies in range.
Damage reduces to 25% for enemies that take damage
from more than one scorching surge.

Launches 3 Core Flare orbs at the target location. Each
nova deals [Damage Rate: 180%] Magic Damage to
enemies hit and inflicts 1 stack of [Burn] and 1 stack of
[Scorch]. Additional novas hitting the same target deal
30% reduced damage.
Gains 1 charge every 15s, up to 3 charges.
[Scorch]: Reduces healing received by 5% for 4s. Stacks
up to 3 times

After a 1s cast, channels for 3s, continuously firing at
target. Each projectile deals [Damage Rate: 30%] Magic
Damage to enemies hit, inflicts 1 stack of [Burn], and
reduces Magic Resistance by 5% for 4s. Stacks up to 6
times.

Channels a starforge beam for 4s after a 1s cast. Deals
[Damage Rate: 75%] Magic Damage to enemies in range
every 0.5s, inflicting 1 stack of [Burn] and [Scorch].
Each hit increases damage by 10%, up to 50%.
Cannot be interrupted during channeling and grants a
[Target-based Max HP 15%] shield.
[Scorch]: Reduces healing received by 5% for 4s. Stacks
up to 3 times.

Enter Molten Volley Mode for 20s. Cannot move while
active but can cancel manually.
Basic Attack replaced: Fires magma at the target location
that rolls forward after impact, dealing [Damage Rate:
110%] Magic Damage to those hit and inflicting 1 stack of
[Burn]. Damage increases by 10% after each enemy hit, up
to 40%.

frost.description:
[Basic Attack]:Deals [Damage Rate: 90%] Magic Damage.

Can cast [Ice Burst] every 5s.
Deals [Damage Rate: 150%] Magic Damage to the target
and Immobilizes them for 1.5s

Replaces Basic Attack with [Frostbite Zone]
Creates a zone of deep frost in the target direction,
dealing [Damage Rate: 130%] Magic Damage to enemies
in range and reducing their Movement Speed by 25% for
4s

Replaces Basic Attack with [Frost Burst].
Launches three frost shards in the target direction after a
delay, each dealing [Damage Rate: 110%] Magic Damage
to enemies hit. The damage from shards beyond the first
is reduced by 25%.

After not taking damage for 20s, gains [Target-based Max
HP 20%] Shield. When hit by Basic Attacks, applies [Frost]
to the attacker.
[Frost]: Reduces Attack Speed and Movement Speed by
40% for 4s, gradually weakening over time.

Channels for 3s, continuously firing a frost beam in the
target direction that deals [Damage Rate: 60%] Magic
Damage to players ([Damage Rate: 120%] Magic Damage
to mobs) every 0.5s to those hit and inflicts [Frost Beam
Slow] for 3s, stacking up to 5 times.

[Frost Beam Slow]
Movement Speed Bonus: -8% (-8% per stack, can stack)

Launches crystalline frost in the target direction. Upon
hitting the first enemy, it explodes to deal [Damage Rate:
250%] Magic Damage and Immobilize enemies in range
for 2s.

frost.skillName:
Deals [Damage Rate: 200%] Magic Damage to nearby
enemies and Freezes them for 0.5s, then blinks in the
target direction.
frost.description:
Deals [Damage Rate: 200%] Magic Damage to nearby
enemies and Freezes them for 0.5s, then blinks in the
target direction.

Creates a frost wall before the caster that lasts 8s.
Enemies inside are Slowed by 70%, take [Damage Rate:
50%] Magic Damage every second, and gain [Chill] stacks.
Stacks up to 2 times.
[Chill]: At max stacks, targets are Frozen for 1.5s and
become immune to [Chill] for 6s.

Unleashes a freezing roar in the target direction, dealing
Damage Rate: 200%] Magic Damage and knocking
enemies back 10m. Reduces Movement Speed by 30% and
Attack Speed by 30% for 4s.

Channels for 3s, releasing frost winds in the target
direction that deal [Damage Rate: 100%] Magic Damage
to players ([Damage Rate: 200%] Magic Damage to mobs)
every 0.5s and reduce Movement Speed by 30% for 3s.
Can move slowly while channeling

Creates a freezing cyclone at the target location, lasting
5s. Enemies inside are Slowed by 60% and take [Damage
Rate: 90%] Magic Damage every second.

Launches ice in the target direction. Upon hitting an
enemy, it splits into 3 ice shards that bounce between
nearby enemies up to 5 times. Each target can be hit up to
2 times.
Each hit deals [Damage Rate: 60%] Magic Damage and
reduces Attack Speed by 15% for 4s. Stacks up to 3 times.

Places a Frost Nova at the target location, lasting 15s.
When triggered by an enemy, deals [Damage Rate: 250%]
Magic Damage and reduces Movement Speed by 35% and
15% reduced healing for 6s.
Gains 1 charge every 15s, up to 3 charges

Launches a frost orb in the target direction that deals
[Damage Rate: 70%] Magic Damage every second and
reduces Movement Speed by 40% for 3s to enemies in
range. Within 3s, can recast to blink to the orb's location,
dealing [Damage Rate: 250%] Magic Damage and
Freezing nearby enemies for 1.5s.

Creates a frost crystal at the target location that forms
after 0.7s, dealing [Damage Rate: 150%] Magic Damage
and Freezing enemies for 1.5s.
After 1s, the crystal shatters, dealing [Damage Rate:
350%] Magic Damage, and reducing Movement Speed by
40% and Attack Speed by 40% for 6s

Grants the power of arctic frost for 20s. Becomes immune
to Slows and Immobilize effects, and gains access to the
[Frost Slash] and [Frost Drift] skills.
-[Frost Slash]-
Launches ice blades forward that deal [Damage Rate:
110%] Magic Damage to enemies in their path, inflicting 1
stack of [Hypothermia] and reducing Movement Speed by
30% for 4s.
At 6 stacks of [Hypothermia], the target gains [Deep
Frost].
[Deep Frost]: Cannot attack or move for 1.5s.
-[Frost Drift] --
Instantly removes control effects and leaps in the target
direction.
[Deep Frost]: Cannot attack or move for 1.5s.

holy.description:
[Basic Attack]:Deals [Damage Rate: 90%] Magic Damage.

Can cast [Holy Feather] every 5s.
Deals [Damage Rate: 150%] Magic Damage to the target
and heals [Healing Rate: 75%] HP for up to 3 allies within
14m

Replaces Basic Attack with [Holy Smite].
After a 0.5s cast, calls down holy smite at the target
location, dealing [Damage Rate: 80%] Magic Damage to
all players ([Damage Rate: 160%] Magic Damage to
mobs). Heals the caster for [Healing Rate: 48%] HP if
hitting at least one enemy.

Replaces Basic Attack with [Holy Heal].
After a 0.5s cast, performs holy healing at the target
location, restoring [Healing Rate: 90%] HP allies in range.
Increases the resistances of allies within 9m by 15%

Projects a holy wave in the target direction, dealing
[Damage Rate: 200%] Magic Damage to all players
([Damage Rate: 300%] Magic Damage to mobs) in its
path. The wave automatically returns when reaching max
range, healing up to 5 nearby allies for [Healing Rate:
75%] HP.

Channels divine link on target for 6s, also granting the
caster [Target-based Max HP 15%] Shield for 4s. Can
move slowly while channeling.
When targeting an ally, heals them for [Healing Rate:
100%] HP every second.
When targeting an enemy, deals [Damage Rate: 100%]
Magic Damage every second.

Projects holy energy at the target location. On impact,
restores [Healing Rate: 75%] HP and grants a
[Target-based Max HP 20%] shield for 4s to allies in
range.

Creates multiple holy walls in front. Enemies who touch
them take [Damage Rate: 150%] Magic Damage and are
stunned for 1.5s, while the caster gains [Target-based
Max HP 12%] Shield for 6s, stacking up to 4 times.

Cleanses all Slow and Immobilize effects and 2 Debuff
effects from the caster and up to 20 nearby allies and
restores [Healing Rate: 100%] HP. Also prevents the next 3
Immobilize and Immune to Slow effects within 4s.

Grants a shield of [Target-based Max HP 25%] to the
caster or an ally for 4s.
When the shield breaks, deals [Damage Rate: 250%] Magic
Damage to nearby enemies

Leaps to the target location. Upon landing, deals
Damage Rate: 300%] Magic Damage to enemies in range
and knocks them up for 0.75s. Heals allies in range for
[Healing Rate: 150%] HP and increases their Dodge by
30% for 6s.

Launches a Holy Chain that bounces to the nearest allied
target within 9 meters after hitting an ally, restoring
[Healing Rate: 100%] HP with each hit. It deals [Damage
Rate: 100%] Magic Damage to up to 5 enemy targets in
range, with damage reduced to 20% for subsequent
explosions.
The chain can bounce up to 9 times, and each target can
be hit a maximum of 3 times.

Creates a holy domain that deals [Damage Rate: 300%]
Magic Damage to enemies in range and knocks them back
10m. Channels for 3s, healing allies in range for [Healing
Rate: 50%] HP every 0.5s and increasing their Damage
Resistance by 10% for 6s. Stacks up to 3 times.

Casts holy radiance at the target location. Heals allies in
range for [Healing Rate: 100%] HP and deals [Damage
Rate: 300%] Magic Damage to enemies, knocking them
back 7m from the center. Gives enemies 60% chance to
miss Basic Attacks and reveals Stealth for 6s.

Creates a Blessed Halo at the target location. After 1s,
heals all allies in range for [Healing Rate: 300%] HP,
cleanses all control effects and 5 debuffs, and grants
immunity to Control and Slow for 4s.

Cleanses an ally or the caster of all Slow and Immobilize
effects, heals [Healing Rate: 300%] HP and grants
Sanctuary for 5s.
Sanctuary grants immunity to Slow and Immobilize, and
prevents HP from falling below 1. Each 10% of missing
HP increases healing received by 5%.
Sanctuary cannot be dispelled.

curse.description:
Deals [Damage Rate: 90%] Magic Damage and applies
[Plague].

Casts for 0.5s, releasing a shockwave in the target
direction; deals [Damage Rate: 100%] Magic Damage to
enemies in its path and applies [Plague].

Throws a pool of venom at the target location, lasting 3s,
slowing enemies inside by 20% and inflicting [Plague]
every second.

[Plague]: Deals [Damage Rate: 20%] Magic Damage every
3s for 13s. Stacks up to 10 times.
When a target affected by [Plague] dies, deals [Damage
Rate: 120%] Magic Damage to up to 5 other nearby
enemies.

Deals [Damage Rate: 125%] Magic Damage to target every
0.7s, inflicts [Plague], and restores [Healing Rate: 25%]
HP
Cannot move while channeling.

Releases a plague surge in target direction, dealing
[Damage Rate: 160%] Magic Damage to enemies hit,
inflicting 2 stacks of [Plague] and reducing Speed by 30%
for 4s.

While active, consumes 15 MP every 3s and inflicts
[Plague] to nearby enemies. Basic Attacks have a 30%
chance to miss for 5s.
Use again to deactivate. Automatically deactivates when
MP is insufficient.

Summons a draining field at the target location, lasting
6s. Slows enemies inside by 30% and inflicts [Exhaustion]
every 1s for 6s, stacking up to 6 times.

[Exhaustion]
Damage Boost: -6% (-6% per stack, can stack)
Healing Bonus: -6% (-6% per stack, can stack)
Attack Speed: -6% (-6% per stack, can stack)

Casts for 0.5s, launching Toxic Matter at the target. Upon
hitting an enemy, it bounces to other enemies within 7m
up to 9 times. Each target can be hit up to 2 times.
Each hit deals [Damage Rate: 120%] Magic Damage and
inflicts 1 stack of Plague and reduces Magic Resistance
by 15% for 4s.

After a 1s cast, doubles the stacks of [Plague] on an
enemy target and refreshes the duration to maximum. If
the doubled stacks exceed the limit, deals ([Damage Rate:
55%] per stack) Magic Damage for excess stacks.
If the target does not have [Plague], inflicts at least one
stack of [Plague] and deals [Damage Rate: 55%] Magic
Damage.

Channels for 0.5s to inflict 2 stacks of [Plague] as well as
[Hexbound Malice] to enemies in range, lasting 9s.
[Hexbound Malice]: Each active skill used consumes 10
extra MP and inflicts [Damage Rate: 200%] Magic
Damage.

Infects any target with Pestilence Source for 8s. Every
second, deals [Damage Rate: 50%] Magic Damage to the
infected and nearby enemies. Inflicts 1 stack of [Plague]
and reduces damage dealt by 5% to enemies except the
carrier for 4s, stacking up to 5 times.

Infects an enemy with [Parasites].
[Parasites]: Parasites last 12s and deal [Damage Rate:
45%] True Damage whenever the target takes direct
damage (minimum interval 0.8s). When dispelled, deals
[Damage Rate: 350%] Magic Damage

Channels for 0.5s to curse a circular area. After a brief
delay, deals [Damage Rate: 250%] Magic Damage to up to
10 enemies in range, dispeling all Buffs, shields, and HoT
effects, and inflicting [Crippled] for 6s.

[Crippled]
Cannot use movement skills or gain buffs, shields, or HoT
effects
Movement Speed Bonus: -50%

Throws a device that generates Necromists randomly
within range every 3s (range gradually expands). Device
lasts 10s.
Necromists deal [Damage Rate: 60%] Magic Damage
every 2s, inflict [Plague], and reduce healing received by
6% for 4s, stacking up to 5 times.

Plants a Bloom of Malice seed before channeling energy
to it for 3s. The seed grows gradually until blooming
(press skill again to bloom early). When blooming, deals
[Damage Rate: 360%] Magic Damage to nearby enemies,
inflicts [Plague] based on growth time, and reduces Max
HP by 2.5% for 4s (stacks up to 10 times).
Effects increase with growth time ([Plague] stacks 1-2->
3-10 / Max HP stacks 1 ->10)

When taking damage at below 30% HP, increases Damage Resistance by 50% for 6s. Trigger Interval: 60s

When dealing direct Basic Attack Damage, creates a Flame Star around the caster, lasting 6s. Reduces enemies' Magic Resistance by 50% (Magic Resistance Reduction), and deals [Damage Rate: 50%] Magic Damage every 1s. Trigger Interval: 30s Passive Debuff Skill
When affected by hard control effects (Stun, Fear, Deep Freeze, Knockup, Petrify): Gains a [Target-based Max HP 25%] shield for 6s. Trigger Interval: 30s Skill

When dealing direct Basic Attack Damage, triggers an EMP blast at current position. After 1s, deals [Damage Rate: 250%] Physical Damage to enemies within 6m, Stuns them for 1s and reduces their damage dealt by 20% for 6s Trigger Interval: 30s Debuff Hard Control Passive Skill
When dealing direct Basic Attack Damage, creates a sandstorm around the caster, lasting 6s. Enemies within 6m are slowed by 40% and disarmed. Trigger Interval: 30s Passive Skill Disarmed

When affected by Immobilize or Forced Movement (Knockback, Pull): Immediately removes all Immobilize, Slow and Forced Movement effects, and increases Damage Resistance by 25%, grants immunity to Slow, Immobilize, and Forced Movement for 8s. Trigger Interval: 30s. Passive Skill

> Grants a shield with [Target-based Max HP 20%] Shield Value to nearby allies for 6s. When HP is below 40%, the Shield Value increases to [Target-based Max HP 35%].
Deals [Damage Rate: 300%] Physical Damage to nearby enemies, stunning them for 1.5s and reducing their Speed by 40% for 4s.
Sounds a war horn, lasting 5s. Allies within 7m gain 30% Damage Resistance, 50 Control Resistance, and immunity to Forced Movement effects (Knockback, Pull).
Shoots a grappling rope that deals [Damage Rate: 100%] Physical Damage to the target, Immobilizes them for 2s, and pulls both toward the middle.

Creates a converging force field. After 1.5s, deals Damage Rate: 250%] Physical Damage to enemies within 7m, pulls them to the center, Stuns them for 0.5s, and Slows them by 30% for 4s.

boots_strength.description: Increases Movement Speed by 50% and restores [Healing Rate: 20%] HP every second for 5s.
For every 10% HP lost, gains 1 stack of Movement Speed Increase by 25% and damage by 7% for 6s. Stacks up to 5 times.
Leap to the target location. Upon landing, grants [Target-based Max HP 22%] Shield to nearby allies for 6s.
Enhances Movement Speed by 30%, Max HP and Current HP by 80%, and grants Immunity to Forced Movement (Pull, Knockback) for 6s.
Remove Slow and immobilize effects. Increases Movement Speed by 80% and gains immunity to Slow and immobilize effects for 4s.

Charges forward 5 times, dealing [Damage Rate: 50%]. Physical Damage to enemies in path and knocking them back 4m each time. If knocked into terrain, enemies are stunned for 2s. Immune to control effects and gains +80% Damage. Resistance while charging.

Leaps to the target location, dealing [Damage Rate: 150%] Physical Damage and inflicting Knockup for 1s to enemies upon landing. Then adjusts direction and leaps again toward the target, dealing another [Damage Rate: 150%] Physical Damage and inflicting Knockup for 1s on enemies upon landing. During the skill's duration, immune to control effects and gains +80% Damage Resistance.

head_dexterity.description:
When taking damage at below 30% HP, immediately
restores [Healing Rate: 40%] HP every second for 5s.
Trigger Interval: 60s

When using Basic Attack, the next 5 Basic Attacks
(including the triggering one) within 8s cast additional
Chain Lightning onto enemy targets. Upon hitting, it
automatically ricochets to the nearest target, up to 5
times, dealing [Damage Rate: 90%] Physical Damage per
hit. (Trigger Interval: 0.6 seconds)
Damage is influenced by Basic Attack damage boost and
can crit based on Basic Attack critical rate.
Cooldown: 30s

When taking damage at below 30% HP, instantly enters
Stealth and increases Movement Speed by 30% for 5s.
After 1.5 seconds in Stealth, using a skill, dealing
damage, or inflicting healing will break Stealth.
Trigger Interval: 60s

When taking damage from Basic Attacks, immediately
gains +70% Dodge Enhancement for 6s.
Trigger Interval: 20s

When dealing direct damage with Basic Attacks, grants
+20% Critical Rate and +35% Attack Speed for 9s.
Trigger Interval: 30s

When taking damage at below 20% HP, prevents HP from
falling below 1 and regenerates [Healing Rate: 30%] HP
every second for 4s. Cannot be dispelled.
Trigger Interval: 120s

When affected by hard control effects (Stun, Fear, Freeze,
Knockup, Petrify, Sleep), Silence, or Immobilize:
Instantly removes all control effects and debuffs, and
grants immunity to control effects and Silence, and
increases Speed by 25% for 4s.
Trigger Interval: 45s.

chest_dexterity.description:
Channel for 5s, recovering [Healing Rate: 70%] HP every
second.
Can move slowly while channeling

Deals [Damage Rate: 100%] True Damage to nearby
enemies. Damage increases by 15% for every 10% HP the
target is missing.

Increases Damage Resistance by 30% for 6s. During this
time, reflects 100% of damage taken as Magic Damage to
the attacker.

Creates a 12m smoke screen, lasting 6s. Enter Stealth for
6s. Every 0.5s in the smoke screen grants 1 stack of +60%
Attack Speed for the next Basic Attack, lasting 6s. Stacks
up to 8 times.
Using a skill, causing direct healing or damage, or leaving
the smoke clears the smoke and removes stealth.

Snarls toward the target direction, dealing [Damage Rate:
200%] Physical Damage to enemies in range. Reduces
their Movement Speed by 40%, damage dealt by 50%, and
disables Stealth for 5s

Deals [Damage Rate: 200%] Physical Damage to nearby
enemies, reduces their Damage Resistance by 20% for 8s
and increases own damage by 12% for 8s

Creates a Rally aura around the caster, lasting 9s
Allies within 7m gain +30% Attack Speed and +30%
Cooldown Speed

boots_dexterity.description:
Step 9m toward target direction. Increases Movement
Speed by 40% for 4s.

Increases Movement Speed by 60% and Attack Speed by
45% for 6s.

Dashes 6m in target direction. Gains 20% Critical Rate for
4s. Stacks up to 2 times.
Can be used again within 4s.

Quickly dash behind target, dealing [Damage Rate: 150%]
Physical Damage and increasing Basic Attack Damage by
40% for 6s.
Gains 1 charge every 20s, up to 2 charges

Increases Movement Speed by 30%, enters Stealth after
1s, gaining +60% Movement Speed for 4s.
Using a skill, dealing damage or inflicting healing breaks
Stealth

Remove control effects and dash toward target direction.
Gain Control Immunity for 2s.
Can be used while skills are disabled

Leave a mark at current position and dash to the target
location. Upon arrival, deal [Damage Rate: 200%] Physical
Damage to enemies in range and reduce their Damage
Resistance by 15% for 4s. Can be cast again within 5
seconds to return to original position and gain 40%
Movement Speed for 3s.

head_intelligence.description:
When casting skills, increases Magic Damage dealt by
20% for 6s
Trigger Interval: 30s

When healing, grants target a [Target-based Max HP 20%]
shield for 6s
Trigger Interval: 20s

When the skill damages an enemy target, it triggers an
explosion at their location, dealing [Damage Rate: 180%]
Magic Damage to enemies in range and reducing their
healing received by 25% for 6s.
Trigger Interval: 25s.

When skills deal direct damage, creates a poison zone
lasting 6s. Enemies within 5m take [Damage Rate: 25%]
Magic Damage every second and have their Magic
Resistance reduced by 20%.
Trigger Interval: 30s

When casting skills with MP below 40%, gains 10 MP
every second for 8s.
Trigger Interval: 45s

When taking damage at below 40% HP, gains a
[Target-based Max HP 25%] shield and generates a
repulsion field lasting 6s. Enemies touching the field take
Damage Rate: 100%] Magic Damage and are knocked
back 7m.
Trigger Interval: 45s

When damage taken within 3s exceeds 35% of max HP,
creates a healing wave that restores [Healing Rate: 200%]
HP to nearby allies and removes control effects.
Trigger Interval: 45s

chest_intelligence.description:
Instantly restores [Healing Rate: 100%] HP to nearby
allies.

Immediately removes all control effects, restores [Healing
Rate: 150%] HP, and grants Control Immunity for 2s.
Can be used while skills are disabled

Creates a 7m radius Mana Font around the caster, lasting 6s
Restores 10 MP to allies in range every 1s
Increases casting speed of friendly units within by 80%

Launches a dispel projectile that deals [Damage Rate:
120%] Magic Damage to enemies in the impact area,
removes all buffs and Shield effects. Reduces target's physical damage dealt by 40%

Deals [Damage Rate: 200%] Magic Damage to nearby
enemies, knocks them back 10m, and reduces their
Movement Speed by 40% for 4s.

Gains a [Target-based Max HP 45%] shield for 6s. While
the shield exists, restores 20 MP each time taking
damage.

Creates a panic curse field around the caster that lasts
6s
Enemies within 6m who use skills take [Damage Rate:
200%] Magic Damage and are affected by Fear for 1.5s

boots_intelligence.description:
Increases Movement Speed by 50% and restores 8 MP
every second for 5s.

Move 12m in target direction. Restore [Healing Rate:
150%] HP and 20 MP.

Increases Movement Speed by 55% for 5s. Creates a frost
path that lasts 4s. Enemies in the path are slowed by 40%
and their Attack Speed is reduced by 45% for 2s.

Increases Movement Speed by 55%, lasting 5s; creates a
path of corruption lasting 4s along movement path.
Enemies in the path suffer 35% reduced damage dealt and
30% reduced healing received for 5s.

Grants a [Target-based Max HP 25%] shield lasting 4s and
swaps positions with target player.

After 1.5s cast time, enters Ghost Form, increases
Movement Speed by 70% and becomes immune to
damage and control effects for 4s. Cannot cast other
skills or attack while in Ghost form.

Increases Movement Speed by 70% and damage by 20%
for 6s.
When effect ends, reduces Damage Resistance by 15% for 4s

spells.description:
Creates a Sandstorm around the caster, pushing all
enemies outside. Channels for 6s with +45% Damage
Resistance and control immunity. Enemies touching the
field take [Damage Rate: 300%] Physical Damage, and are
Silenced and Slowed by 60% for 4s. Also knocks them
back 11m from center. The Sandstorm applies 60% Slow.

Creates a circular storm field around the caster for 4s
when causing Forced Movement (Pull, Knockback). Deals
[Damage Rate: 100%] Physical Damage to enemies in
field, inflicting 40% Slow and a 40% chance to miss Basic
Attacks for 3s. (Cooldown: 20s)

After a brief charge-up, unleash a Frozen Maelstrom
forward, dealing 640[Damage Rate: 200%] Magic Damage
to enemies in the area, applying Slow by 40%% and
reducing Attack Speed by 40%%, lasting 6s. The punch
also deals 960[Damage Rate: 300%] additional Magic
Damage to enemies directly in front and applies Frozen
for 3s.

Gains 25% Damage Resistance if damage is dealt within
5, lasts for 6s. When taking damage during this time,
sends forth freezing air in all directions, dealing
256[Damage Rate: 80%] Magic Damage to targets within
range, reducing Attack Speed by 30% and Movement
Speed by 30% for 4s. Minimum interval of 1s. (Cooldown:
20s)

Sprays ooze for 4s, creating 4 ooze zones every second
that last 8.5s. Enemies in ooze zones are Slowed by 50%.
Enemies entering ooze zones gain [Acid Blast].

[Acid Blast]
Reduces Damage by 40% and cancels Stealth. Takes
[Damage Rate: 20%] Magic Damage every 1s per stack for
6s. Stacks up to 3 times.

After taking 5 instances of damage, releases acid
outward, dealing [Damage Rate: 70%] Magic Damage to
enemies in range, reducing their damage dealt by 25% and
Movement Speed by 25% for 4s.

Leaps to the target location. Gains immunity to control
during leap. Deals[Damage Rate: 350%] Physical
Damage and knocks enemies in the area up for 1.5s.

When inflicting Immobilize or Hard Control (Stun, Fear,
Freeze, Knockup, Petrify), drops a meteor after 1s, dealing
480[Damage Rate: 150%] Physical Damage and 30% Slow
for 3s. (Cooldown: 5s)

Grants Shield of Conviction to up to 5 allies around the
caster for 6s. Allies with Shield of Conviction gain
[Target-based Max HP 30%] Shield effect, and 30% of
damage dealt will be converted into shield value, up to
[Target-based Max HP 15%] additional Shield. After 6s, if
the shield remains unbroken, deals [Damage Rate: 300%]
Magic Damage to nearby enemies. Subsequent
explosions deal reduced damage (15%).

Gains immunity to control effects and 20% Damage
Resistance whenever gaining shield for as long as the
shield remains. (Cooldown: 20s)

Channel for 6s, gaining immunity to control. Allies on the
field gain +40% Max HP and immunity to Forced
Movement (Pull, Knockback). Each 5000 total damage
taken by allies grants 1 Energy stack, up to 5.
Use again within 12s of starting the channeling to
unleash absorbed energy, dealing [Damage Rate:
350%]-[Damage Rate: 700%] Magic Damage based on
stacks and reducing Movement Speed by 30% for 4s.

Taking damage equal to 10% of Max HP within 5s after
skill cast grants 25% Damage Resistance for 6s. During
this time, reflect Magic Damage equal to 65% + 1.5% of
Max HP to the attacker. (Cooldown: 25s)

Channel for 4s with control immunity and 30% increased
Movement Speed. On hit, deals [Damage Rate: 215%]
Physical Damage and creates a chain link (max 5 chains).
Chains break at range limit. After the channeling ends,
pull all chained targets to deal [Damage Rate: 215%]
Physical Damage and Stun them for 1.5s.

When inflicting Forced Movement (Pull, Knockback) on
enemies, creates a circular prison lasting 4s. Enemies
touching the prison take [Damage Rate: 100%] Magic
Damage and are Immobilized until the prison ends
(Cooldown: 20s)

Creates a protection zone at the target location that
grants allies within +30% Damage Resistance, +40%
Healing Received, +40% Dodge and heals for [Healing
Rate: 50%] HP every second. Then leaps to the target
location, dealing [Damage Rate: 250%] Physical Damage
to those hit and knocking them up for 1s.
Immune to control during prep and leap.

Gains 25% Damage Resistance for 1s if HP is below 75%.
Sends healing radiation waves in all directions, healing
allies in range for [Healing Rate: 50%] HP and granting
[Target-based Max HP 5%] Shield every 1s for 4s.
(Cooldown: 20s)

Transform into a turret for 25s. Basic Attacks become
artillery strikes, firing projectiles at targets beyond 8m,
dealing [Damage Rate: 250%] Physical Damage to players
([Damage Rate: 150%] Physical Damage to mobs).
Artillery Critical Damage is 150%.

While standing still, gain 1 stack of [Steadfast] every
second.
[Steadfast]: +2% Critical Rate, +1.5% damage for 3s.
Stacks up to 15 times

Channel void energy for 5s and send forth 37 Void Orbs,
each dealing [Damage Rate: 30%] Magic Damage and
inflicting [Void Toxin]
Skill cannot be interrupted.
[Void Toxin]: Deals [Damage Rate: 10%] Magic Damage
every second (increases based on stacks) for 12s,
stacking up to 5 times. [Void Toxin] from different sources
share stacks.

Gains 5% Movement Speed for 3s when inflicting an
enemy with a DoT effect, stacking up to 6 times.

Links to 8 targets within 10m around the caster,
channeling for 4s. Restores [Healing Rate: 40%] HP to the
caster and linked allies every 0.5s, while dealing [Damage
Rate: 70%] Magic Damage to linked enemies.
Cannot be interrupted while channeling.
Other allies within 12m receive +20% healing.

Removes all control effects and gains [Submerge] for
2.5s
[Submerge]: Dives underground, becoming immune to all
damage and control effects. Increases Movement Speed
by 40% and recovers[Healing Rate: 49%] HP every
second.
Press skill again to exit [Submerge] early.
Upon exiting [Submerge], deals [Damage Rate: 200%]
Magic Damage to nearby enemies.
Can be used while skills are disabled

Dealing damage with a skill grants 1 stack of Swarm,
restoring [Healing Rate: 7.5%] HP every 2s for 6s
(stacks do not boost healing effect). During this time,
Damage Resistance increases by 5%, stacking up to 5
times. (Cooldown: 0.5s)

Applies Serpent's Whisper to the caster or an allied target,
preventing movement and skill usage for 4s and granting
immunity to damage and control. Deals [Damage Rate:
58%] Magic Damage to nearby enemies every 0.5s and
applies [Creeping Stone]
[Creeping Stone]: Lasts 1s, stacking up to 4 times. Target
is Petrified and has their Armor reduced by 25% for 2 at
max stacks (cannot gain [Creeping Stone] for 6)
Can be used while skills are disabled. Serpent's Whisper
cannot be dispelled.

Retains 1 HP upon taking lethal damage, transforming
into a spirit serpent, cleansing all negative effects
(control, DoT, and debuffs), gaining immunity to control,
debuffs and damage for 2s, and +100% Movement Speed,
and healing 5% HP every 0.5s. (CD: 120s)

Creates a Genetic Cascade link with the target, lasting
15s.
For allied targets: Restores [Healing Rate: 25%] HP every
second and increases damage dealt by 3% for 5s. Stacks
up to 10 times.
For enemy targets: Deals [Damage Rate: 50%] Magic
Damage every second and reduces damage dealt by 3%
for 5s. Stacks up to 10 times.
Can link to another target of a different type while a link is
active.
Link breaks if the target moves over 25m away.

After dealing damage 5 times, creates two Yin Vortexes
around the caster that deal [Damage Rate: 100%] Magic
Damage to enemies hit and reduce healing received by 5%
for 4s. Stacks up to 3 times. (Cooldown: 0.5s)
After healing 5 times, creates two Yang Vortexes around
self that restore [Healing Rate: 50%] HP to allies hit and
increase healing received by 5% for 4s. Stacks up to 3
times. (Cooldown: 0.5s)

Select an enemy target to summon ravens. After 2
seconds, ravens dive to attack, dealing [Damage Rate:
210%] Magic Damage to up to 5 enemies in range,
dispelling all buffs, shields, and HoT effects. Applies 50%
Slow and reduces damage dealt by 50% for 6s. Targets
cannot gain buffs, shields, or HoT effects during this time.

Skills dealing damage grant the caster Raven's Call. At 6
stacks, the next skill damage within 8s that hits an enemy
target will summon ravens at the location, dealing
[Damage Rate: 120%] Magic Damage to up to 5 enemy
targets in range. This effect removes 1 stack of buffs from
hit targets and restores [Healing Rate: 60%] HP to self.
(Trigger Interval: 0.5s)

Creates a Lunar Domain and channels for 8s. Enemies
within are struck by starlight on skill use, taking [Damage
Rate: 200%] Magic Damage and losing 20 MP. Allies
within recover 8 MP every second and gain [Target-based
Max HP 15%] Shield lasting 4s.
Skill cannot be interrupted. +20% Movement Speed while
channeling.

Every 2s restores Moonveil Max MP + 3% MP to other
allies within 12m

Creates an expanding Sanctification Field at the target
location and channels for 5s.
Cannot be interrupted while channeling.
Cleanses control effects every 0.5s, 2 debuffs, and 2 DoT
effects, from up to 20 allies in the field and restores
[Healing Rate: 25%] HP.

When healing with skills, the target gains 5% additional
Damage Resistance for 4s. Stacks up to 6 times

Creates an astral field beneath the caster. After 3s,
teleports up to 15 teammates in range to the target
location. Upon arrival, deals [Damage Rate: 200%] Magic
Damage to surrounding enemies and Stuns them for 1s.
Allies gain [Target-based Max HP 20%] Shield, +30%
Movement Speed, immunity to Slow and Immobilize
effects for 4s.
If there's unpassable terrain in the teleportation path,
teleport to that position instead ..

Reduces the cooldown of all skills (not including Tactical
Item skills) by 0.3s when this skill deals damage.
(Cooldown: 0.5s)

Activate an Electric Device for 8s.
Electric Device hits up to 5 enemies every 0.5s for
[Damage Rate: 40%] Physical Damage, reducing Armor by
8% for 8s. Stacks up to 10 times.

Basic Attacks grant 1 stack of Electric Charge. At 5
stacks, the next attack triggers EMP Blast dealing
[Damage Rate: 160%] Physical Damage to enemies in
range.

Creates a void field lasting 8s that envelops the caster
and up to 5 enemies, dealing 192[Damage Rate: 50%]
Magic Damage to enemies within. Enemies in the void are
immune to Physical Damage, cannot perform basic
attacks, are slowed for 30%, and have their Magic
Resistance reduced by 30%. The caster can still perform
basic attacks and gain 35% Basic Attack Lifesteal, while
also ignoring the Physical Damage immunity of enemies
in the void.

30% chance to gain an effect granting immunity to
Physical immunity, 30% reduced Magic Resistance, and
20% increased Healing Received that last 4s when taking
Physical Damage. (Cooldown: 30s)

Removes all current shield values, dealing 848[Damage
Rate: 250%] Physical Damage to nearby enemies, while
also gaining 70% Attack Speed, 30% Movement Speed,
and 30% Critical Rate, and becoming Immune to Control
Effects for 6s.

While without Armor, gains 5 Energy per second, and
gains 5 Energy on Basic Attack Crit. When Energy reaches
100, restores [Target-based Max HP 15%] Armor.
While with Armor, gains [Target-based Max HP 3%] Armor
on Basic Attack Crit. Armor restored cannot exceed
[Target-based Max HP 25%]. (Trigger Interval: a cooldown
of 1 seconds)

Releases a Null Pulse in the target direction, dealing
 [Damage Rate: 50%] Physical Damage to enemies in
range, knocking them back 12m, and applying Silence and
40% Slow for 3s.
Has a 35% chance to dodge Basic Attack damage.

Enters Stealth, gaining [Spectral Shield] and the ability
[Phantom Bind], lasting 9s.
Spectral Shield: Grants [Target-based Max HP 25%] shield
effect; if the Spectral Shield fades out, the Phantom Bind
effect ends prematurely.
Phantom Bind: Summon phantoms that track enemies in
range, dealing 557[Damage Rate: 183%] Magic Damage
and replenishing [Target-based Max HP 5%] Spectral
Shield.
Doesn't break Phantom Clone Stealth ..
Using any skill other than Phantom Bind, or dealing direct
healing or damage, reveals you for 2s before re-entering
Stealth.
Recovers 6% HP every 2s while in Stealth.

Enters Stealth when standing still unhurt and not using
skills for a short duration. Damage, skills, or movement
breaks Stealth.
Warning when enemies are 7-14m away. Stealth breaks
after 3s within 7m.
Recovers 6% HP every 2s while in Stealth

Creates a field around the caster, lasting 20s. Then
scatter 8 Shadow Clones, each dealing [Damage Rate:
200%] Physical Damage to those hit. Damage reduces to
15% for subsequent hits on the same target. While in the
field, skill changes to [Shadow Swap]. Touching a
Shadow Clone reduces Shadow Swap's cooldown by 5s,
grants [Target-based Max HP 10%] Shield and +20%
Movement Speed for 4s.
Field disappears when leaving range.
[Shadow Swap]: Dash forward and increase the Attack
Speed of the next 5 basic attacks within 6s by 60%.

Grants Basic Attacks a 30% chance to trigger a shadow
strike for 6s, dealing [Damage Rate: 100%] Physical
Damage (Cooldown: 0.8s).
Basic Attack Damage Bonuses affect damage and basic
attack critical hits can cause the damage to crit.

Activates Crimson Vortex for 6s.
Crimson Vortex deals [Damage Rate: 75%] Physical Damage to up to 5 enemies every second, healing the caster for 60% of damage dealt.
Damage increases up to [Damage Rate: 150%] as HP drops.
Gains +4% Damage Resistance and +6% Attack Speed for every 10% HP lost.

On Critical Hit, deals [Damage Rate: 70%] Physical
Damage to nearby enemies, while also reducing their
Armor by 15% for 4s. (Cooldown: 1.3s)

Creates a Spectral Disguise granting Stealth to the caster
and up to 15 nearby allies, increasing Damage Resistance
by 25% for 8s
Using a skill, dealing damage or inflicting healing breaks
Stealth for 4s before reapplying

Skill and Basic Attack hits from the rear deal [Damage
Rate: 60%] additional Physical Damage (Cooldown: 0.3s).
Basic Attack Damage Bonuses affect damage and basic
attack critical hits can cause the damage to crit.

When weapon skills or Basic Attacks deal direct
damage, has a %s1% chance to gain 2 stacks of
Sword Momentum and increase Damage
Resistance by %s2% for 4s.
Trigger Interval: 15s.
Sword Momentum: Damage Boost: +3% (3% per
stack, can stack)
Damage Resistance: +4% (4% per stack, can stack)
Attack Speed: +4% (4% per stack, can stack)

mods.name: Disrupt
mods.description:
Only triggers with Maces
When weapon skills or Basic Attacks deal Direct
Damage, has a 35% chance to create a disruption
field around the caster. Enemies within take %s1%
reduced Damage and have their Attack Speed
reduced by %s2% for 4s.
Cooldown: 15s.

mods.name: Seize Chance
mods.description:
Only triggers with Axes
When gaining the [Bloodthirst] buff, has a 25%
chance to increase Attack Speed by %s2% and
Damage by %s1% for 6s.
Trigger Interval: 20s.

mods.name: Detonate
mods.description:
Only triggers with Bows
When arrows deal direct damage, has a %s1%
chance of creating an explosion at the target
location dealing [Damage Rate: %s2%] Physical Damage
 and applying[Target Mark].
Trigger Interval: 10s.

mods.name: Synergy
mods.description:
Only triggers with Spears
When scoring a Critical Hit, has a %s1% chance to
increase Attack Speed by %s2% for 6s.
Cooldown: 15s

mods.name: Annihilate
mods.description:
Only triggers with Daggers
Against targets below 40%, Basic Attacks have a
%s1% chance to deal additional [Damage Rate: %s2%]Physical Damage
and apply 2 stacks of [Bleed].
Trigger Interval: 15s.
[Bleed]: Deals [Damage Rate: 30%] Physical
Damage every second for 8s, stacking up to 6
times. At max stacks, causes Hemorrhage,
removing all stacks and instantly dealing [Damage
Rate: 100%] Physical Damage.

mods.name: Wild Growth
mods.description:
Only triggers with Bloom Staves
When weapon skills or Basic Attacks directly heal
an ally with Recovery, has a %s1% * Recovery stacks
chance to grant [Target-based Max HP %s2%] Shield
for 4s.
Trigger Interval: 15s.
Recovery: Restores [Healing Rate: 12%] HP every
second for 12s, stacking up to 3 times.

mods.name: Ice Blast
mods.description:
Only triggers with Ice Foci
When weapon skills or Basic Attacks deal direct
damage, has a %s1% chance to trigger a frost
explosion at the target location 
that deals [Damage Rate: %s2%] Magic Damage
 to all enemies within 4m and inflicts Frost.
Trigger Interval: 20s.
Frost: Movement Speed is reduced by -40% for 4s,
Slow gradually diminishes over time

mods.name: Flame Blast
mods.description:
Only triggers with Cannonades
When weapon skills or Basic Attacks deal direct
damage, has a %s1% chance to trigger a flame
explosion at the target location 
that deals [Damage Rate: %s2%] Magic Damage 
to all enemies within 4m and inflicts 2
stacks of Burn.
Trigger Interval: 15s.
Burn: Deals [Damage Rate: 25%] Magic Damage
every second for 8s, stacking up to 6 times. At 6
stacks, removes the effect and deals [Damage
Rate: 80%] Magic Damage to enemy targets within
4m of the carrier.

mods.name: Blessing
mods.description:
Only triggers with Radiant Fluxes
When weapon skills or Basic Attacks apply direct
healing to allies, has a %s1% chance to increase
target's Damage Resistance by %s2% for 5s.
Trigger Interval: 15s.

mods.name: Curse
mods.description:
Only triggers with Voidcallers
When weapon skills or Basic Attacks inflict DoT
effects on enemies, has a %s1% chance to inflict 2
stacks of Plague.
Trigger Interval: %s2%s.
Plague: Deals [Damage Rate: 20%] Magic Damage
every 3s for 13s. Stacks up to 10 times.

mods.name: Renovate
mods.description:
When Weapon Skills or Basic Attacks deal direct
 damage, has a %s1% chance to restore 1 bullet and 
 boosts Basic Attack Damage by %s2% for 5s.
Trigger Interval: 15s.

mods.name: EarthQuake
mods.description:
When a weapon skill inflicts Hard Control effects
(Stun, Fear, Frozen, Knockup, Petrify) or Pull
effects, it has a %s1% chance to create an
earthquake at the target's location. After a
1.5-second delay, it deals
 [Damage Rate: %s2%] Physical Damage and
applies Stun for %s3% seconds.
Cooldown: 30s.

mods.name: Rend
mods.description:
When dealing direct damage with Basic Attacks,
has a %s1% chance to deal additional
 [Damage Rate: %s2%] Physical Damage 
to the current target and reduce
Movement Speed by %s3% for 2s.
Trigger Interval: 30s

mods.name: Retribution
mods.description:
When weapon skills deal direct damage, there is a
%s1% chance to trigger an explosion at the target
location, dealing
[Damage Rate: %s2%]Magic Damage 
 and increasing
Damage Resistance by %s3% for 4s.
Trigger Interval: 30s.
